## tanzu update

Update the CLI

```
tanzu update [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help               help for update
  -u, --include-unstable   include unstable versions of the plugins
  -l, --local strings      path to local repository
  -y, --yes                force update; skip prompt
```
